column4: 10.04 trying to loop mount iso on usb drive.. using "sudo grub-install --root-directory=/media/New Volume /dev/sdx" I get 'More than one install devices?' and the grub syntax screen. Could someone help me with my command line?
yes, or put the whole thing between quotation marks
well, it should certainly not be sdx, it should be something that makes sense for your system :P
